tasks.label: simple-prisma build
tasks.command: rm -rf dist && npm run build && mkdir -p ${workspaceFolder}/dist/node_modules/@generated && cp -rf ${workspaceFolder}/examples/simple-prisma/node_modules/@generated/ ${workspaceFolder}/dist/node_modules/@generated

tasks.label: advanced-prisma build
tasks.command: rm -rf dist && npm run build && mkdir -p ${workspaceFolder}/dist/node_modules/@generated && cp -rf ${workspaceFolder}/examples/advanced-prisma/node_modules/@generated/ ${workspaceFolder}/dist/node_modules/@generated
